summary: News aggregation website that automatically fetches and displays articles from Telugu news sources.
architectural_notes: Auto-aggregation of articles from Telugu news sources: eenadu.net, sakshi.com, andhrajyothy.com

existing_features.title: Update the Admin dashboard (AdminPage.tsx) to support triggering auto-fetch from all three sources — Eenadu, Sakshi, and Andhra Jyothy — either individually via per-source buttons or collectively via a single 'Fetch All Sources' button. Display the fetch status and result count (articles added) for each source after execution.

Update the useQueries.ts React Query hooks to include mutation or query hooks for the new multi-source auto-fetch backend function(s), ensuring cache invalidation for the news article list after successful ingestion.

new_feature_requests.summary: Automate fetching and adding articles from eenadu.net, sakshi.com, and andhrajyothy.com into the website

Extend the backend auto-fetch HTTP outcall logic to fetch and parse articles from https://www.eenadu.net/, https://www.sakshi.com/, and https://www.andhrajyothy.com/ — attempt RSS feed endpoints (e.g., /rss, /feed, /rss.xml) for each domain. For each source, extract article title, summary, URL, category, author, and publication date, then store them as News records, deduplicating by URL so re-fetching does not create duplicates.
